original_text: Tell them this: “I, the Lord, have heard your words. I promise you, as surely as I live, I will certainly do to you as you have said.
korean_text: 그들에게 이르기를 여호와의 말씀에 내 삶을 두고 맹세하노라 너희 말이 내 귀에 들린 대로 내가 너희에게 행하리니

sentences.original_text: I, the Lord, have heard your words.
I promise you, as surely as I live,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 살아 있는 한 내가 너희에게 약속하니,

sentences.original_text: I will certainly do to you
